text: "Deck the Halls" is a Christmas and New Year's themed song. The "fa-la-la" refrains were played earlier on harps. The tunes of this song are that of old Welsh air. Various singers have covered the song, including James Taylor and Nat King Cole. Category:Christmas carols Category:1860s songs Category:Nat King Cole songs Category:James Taylor songs Category:Michael McDonald (musician) songs
title: Deck the Halls
